nfs4_op_create.c

Go to the documentation of this file.

00127 
00141 #define arg_CREATE4 op->nfs_argop4_u.opcreate
00142 #define res_CREATE4 resp->nfs_resop4_u.opcreate
00143 
00144 int nfs4_op_create(  struct nfs_argop4 * op ,   
00145                      compound_data_t   * data,
00146                      struct nfs_resop4 * resp)
00147 {
00148   cache_entry_t      * pentry_parent = NULL ;
00149   cache_entry_t      * pentry_new = NULL ;
00150 
00151   fsal_attrib_list_t   attr_parent ;
00152   fsal_attrib_list_t   attr_new ;
00153   fsal_attrib_list_t   sattr ;
00154 
00155   fsal_handle_t      * pnewfsal_handle = NULL ;
00156   
00157   nfs_fh4              newfh4 ;
00158   cache_inode_status_t cache_status ;
00159   int                  convrc = 0 ;
00160   
00161   fsal_accessmode_t mode = 0000 ;
00162   fsal_name_t       name ;
00163   
00164   cache_inode_create_arg_t create_arg;
00165 
00166   char            __attribute__(( __unused__ )) funcname[] = "nfs4_op_create" ;
00167   unsigned int    i = 0 ;  
00168   
00169   resp->resop = NFS4_OP_CREATE ;
00170   res_CREATE4.status =  NFS4_OK  ;
00171   
00172   /* If the filehandle is Empty */
00173   if( nfs4_Is_Fh_Empty( &(data->currentFH  ) ) )
00174     {
00175       res_CREATE4.status = NFS4ERR_NOFILEHANDLE ;
00176       return res_CREATE4.status ;
00177     }
00178   
00179   /* If the filehandle is invalid */
00180   if( nfs4_Is_Fh_Invalid( &(data->currentFH ) ) )
00181     {
00182       res_CREATE4.status = NFS4ERR_BADHANDLE ;
00183       return res_CREATE4.status ;
00184     }
00185   
00186   /* Tests if the Filehandle is expired (for volatile filehandle) */
00187   if( nfs4_Is_Fh_Expired( &(data->currentFH) ) )
00188     {
00189       res_CREATE4.status = NFS4ERR_FHEXPIRED ;
00190       return res_CREATE4.status ;
00191     }
00192   
00193   /* Pseudo Fs is explictely a Read-Only File system */
00194   if( nfs4_Is_Fh_Pseudo(  &(data->currentFH) ) )
00195     {
00196       res_CREATE4.status = NFS4ERR_ROFS ;
00197       return res_CREATE4.status ;
00198     }
00199 
00200   /* Ask only for supported attributes */
00201   if( !nfs4_Fattr_Supported( &arg_CREATE4.createattrs ) )
00202     {
00203        res_CREATE4.status = NFS4ERR_ATTRNOTSUPP ;
00204        return res_CREATE4.status ;
00205     }
00206 
00207   /* Do not use READ attr, use WRITE attr */
00208   if( !nfs4_Fattr_Check_Access( &arg_CREATE4.createattrs, FATTR4_ATTR_WRITE ) )
00209     {
00210       res_CREATE4.status = NFS4ERR_INVAL ;
00211       return res_CREATE4.status ;
00212     }
00213 
00214   /* Check for name to long */
00215   if( arg_CREATE4.objname.utf8string_len > FSAL_MAX_NAME_LEN )
00216     {
00217       res_CREATE4.status = NFS4ERR_NAMETOOLONG ;
00218       return res_CREATE4.status ;
00219     }
00220   
00221   /* 
00222    * This operation is used to create a non-regular file, 
00223    * this means: - a symbolic link
00224    *             - a block device file
00225    *             - a character device file
00226    *             - a socket file
00227    *             - a fifo
00228    *             - a directory 
00229    *
00230    * You can't use this operation to create a regular file, you have to use NFS4_OP_OPEN for this
00231    */
00232   
00233   /* Convert the UFT8 objname to a regular string */
00234   if( arg_CREATE4.objname.utf8string_len == 0 )
00235     {
00236       res_CREATE4.status = NFS4ERR_INVAL ;
00237       return res_CREATE4.status ;
00238     }
00239   
00240   if( utf82str( name.name, &arg_CREATE4.objname ) == -1 )
00241     {
00242       res_CREATE4.status = NFS4ERR_INVAL ;
00243       return res_CREATE4.status ;
00244     }
00245   name.len = strlen( name.name ) ;
00246  
00247    /* Sanuty check: never create a directory named '.' or '..' */
00248    if(  arg_CREATE4.objtype.type == NF4DIR  )
00249      {
00250         if( !FSAL_namecmp( &name, &FSAL_DOT ) || !FSAL_namecmp( &name, &FSAL_DOT_DOT )  )
00251           {
00252              res_CREATE4.status = NFS4ERR_BADNAME ;
00253              return res_CREATE4.status ;
00254           }
00255 
00256      }
00257 
00258   /* Filename should contain not slash */
00259   for( i = 0 ; i < name.len ; i ++ )
00260     {
00261         if( name.name[i] == '/' ) 
00262           {
00263              res_CREATE4.status = NFS4ERR_BADCHAR ;
00264              return res_CREATE4.status ;
00265           }
00266     } 
00267   /* Convert current FH into a cached entry, the current_pentry (assocated with the current FH will be used for this */
00268   pentry_parent = data->current_entry ;
00269 
00270   /* The currentFH must point to a directory (objects are always created within a directory) */
00271   if( data->current_filetype != DIR_BEGINNING && data->current_filetype != DIR_CONTINUE )
00272     {
00273       res_CREATE4.status = NFS4ERR_NOTDIR ;
00274       return res_CREATE4.status ;
00275     }
00276   
00277   /* get attributes of parent directory, for 'change4' info replyed */
00278   if( ( cache_status = cache_inode_getattr( pentry_parent, 
00279                                             &attr_parent,
00280                                             data->ht,
00281                                             data->pclient, 
00282                                             data->pcontext, 
00283                                             &cache_status) ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00284     {
00285       res_CREATE4.status = nfs4_Errno( cache_status ) ;
00286       return res_CREATE4.status ;
00287     }
00288   /* Change info for client cache coherency, pentry internal_md is used for that */
00289   memset( &(res_CREATE4.CREATE4res_u.resok4.cinfo.before), 0, sizeof( changeid4 ) ) ;
00290   res_CREATE4.CREATE4res_u.resok4.cinfo.before = (changeid4)pentry_parent->internal_md.mod_time;
00291 
00292   /* Convert the incoming fattr4 to a vattr structure, if such arguments are supplied */
00293   if( arg_CREATE4.createattrs.attrmask.bitmap4_len != 0 )
00294     {
00295       /* Arguments were supplied, extract them */
00296       convrc = nfs4_Fattr_To_FSAL_attr( &sattr, &(arg_CREATE4.createattrs) ) ; 
00297 
00298       if( convrc == 0 )
00299         {
00300           res_CREATE4.status = NFS4ERR_ATTRNOTSUPP  ;
00301           return res_CREATE4.status ;
00302         }
00303 
00304       if( convrc == -1 )
00305         {
00306           res_CREATE4.status = NFS4ERR_BADXDR ;
00307           return res_CREATE4.status ;
00308         }
00309     }
00310   
00311   /* Create either a symbolic link or a directory */
00312   switch( arg_CREATE4.objtype.type ) 
00313     {
00314     case NF4LNK :
00315       /* Convert the name to link from into a regular string */
00316       if( arg_CREATE4.objtype.createtype4_u.linkdata.utf8string_len == 0 )
00317         {
00318           res_CREATE4.status = NFS4ERR_INVAL ;
00319           return res_CREATE4.status ;
00320         }
00321       else
00322         {
00323           if( utf82str( create_arg.link_content.path, &arg_CREATE4.objtype.createtype4_u.linkdata ) == -1 )
00324             {
00325               res_CREATE4.status = NFS4ERR_INVAL ;
00326               return res_CREATE4.status ;
00327             }
00328           create_arg.link_content.len = strlen( create_arg.link_content.path ) ;
00329         }
00330       
00331       /* do the symlink operation */
00332       if( ( pentry_new = cache_inode_create( pentry_parent,
00333                                              &name, 
00334                                              SYMBOLIC_LINK, 
00335                                              mode, 
00336                                              &create_arg, 
00337                                              &attr_new,
00338                                              data->ht, 
00339                                              data->pclient, 
00340                                              data->pcontext, 
00341                                              &cache_status ) ) == NULL )
00342          {
00343            res_CREATE4.status = nfs4_Errno( cache_status ) ;
00344            return res_CREATE4.status ;
00345          }      
00346 
00347      /* If entry exists pentry_new is not null but cache_status was set */
00348      if( cache_status == CACHE_INODE_ENTRY_EXISTS )
00349        {
00350          res_CREATE4.status = NFS4ERR_EXIST ;
00351          return res_CREATE4.status ;
00352        }
00353 
00354 
00355             
00356       break ;
00357     case NF4DIR:
00358       /* Create a new directory */
00359       /* do the symlink operation */
00360       if( ( pentry_new = cache_inode_create( pentry_parent,
00361                                              &name, 
00362                                              DIR_BEGINNING,
00363                                              mode, 
00364                                              &create_arg, 
00365                                              &attr_new,
00366                                              data->ht, 
00367                                              data->pclient, 
00368                                              data->pcontext, 
00369                                              &cache_status ) ) == NULL )
00370          {
00371            res_CREATE4.status = nfs4_Errno( cache_status ) ;
00372            return res_CREATE4.status ;
00373          }      
00374          
00375       /* If entry exists pentry_new is not null but cache_status was set */
00376       if( cache_status == CACHE_INODE_ENTRY_EXISTS )
00377        {
00378           res_CREATE4.status = NFS4ERR_EXIST ;
00379           return res_CREATE4.status ;
00380        }    
00381       break ;
00382       
00383     case NF4SOCK:
00384       
00385       /* Create a new socket file */
00386       if( ( pentry_new = cache_inode_create( pentry_parent,
00387                                              &name, 
00388                                              SOCKET_FILE,
00389                                              mode,
00390                                              NULL,
00391                                              &attr_new,
00392                                              data->ht,
00393                                              data->pclient,
00394                                              data->pcontext,
00395                                              &cache_status ) ) == NULL )
00396       {
00397         res_CREATE4.status = nfs4_Errno( cache_status ) ;
00398         return res_CREATE4.status ;
00399       }      
00400 
00401       /* If entry exists pentry_new is not null but cache_status was set */
00402       if( cache_status == CACHE_INODE_ENTRY_EXISTS )
00403       {
00404         res_CREATE4.status = NFS4ERR_EXIST ;
00405         return res_CREATE4.status ;
00406       }   
00407      break ;
00408 
00409     case NF4FIFO:
00410       
00411       /* Create a new socket file */
00412       if( ( pentry_new = cache_inode_create( pentry_parent,
00413                                              &name, 
00414                                              FIFO_FILE,
00415                                              mode,
00416                                              NULL,
00417                                              &attr_new,
00418                                              data->ht,
00419                                              data->pclient,
00420                                              data->pcontext,
00421                                              &cache_status ) ) == NULL )
00422       {
00423         res_CREATE4.status = nfs4_Errno( cache_status ) ;
00424         return res_CREATE4.status ;
00425       }      
00426 
00427       /* If entry exists pentry_new is not null but cache_status was set */
00428       if( cache_status == CACHE_INODE_ENTRY_EXISTS )
00429       {
00430         res_CREATE4.status = NFS4ERR_EXIST ;
00431         return res_CREATE4.status ;
00432       }   
00433      break ;
00434 
00435     case NF4CHR:
00436       
00437       create_arg.dev_spec.major = arg_CREATE4.objtype.createtype4_u.devdata.specdata1;
00438       create_arg.dev_spec.minor = arg_CREATE4.objtype.createtype4_u.devdata.specdata2;
00439       
00440       /* Create a new socket file */
00441       if( ( pentry_new = cache_inode_create( pentry_parent,
00442                                              &name, 
00443                                              CHARACTER_FILE,
00444                                              mode,
00445                                              &create_arg,
00446                                              &attr_new,
00447                                              data->ht,
00448                                              data->pclient,
00449                                              data->pcontext,
00450                                              &cache_status ) ) == NULL )
00451       {
00452         res_CREATE4.status = nfs4_Errno( cache_status ) ;
00453         return res_CREATE4.status ;
00454       }      
00455 
00456       /* If entry exists pentry_new is not null but cache_status was set */
00457       if( cache_status == CACHE_INODE_ENTRY_EXISTS )
00458       {
00459         res_CREATE4.status = NFS4ERR_EXIST ;
00460         return res_CREATE4.status ;
00461       }   
00462      break ;
00463      
00464     case NF4BLK:
00465       
00466       create_arg.dev_spec.major = arg_CREATE4.objtype.createtype4_u.devdata.specdata1;
00467       create_arg.dev_spec.minor = arg_CREATE4.objtype.createtype4_u.devdata.specdata2;
00468       
00469       /* Create a new socket file */
00470       if( ( pentry_new = cache_inode_create( pentry_parent,
00471                                              &name, 
00472                                              BLOCK_FILE,
00473                                              mode,
00474                                              &create_arg,
00475                                              &attr_new,
00476                                              data->ht,
00477                                              data->pclient,
00478                                              data->pcontext,
00479                                              &cache_status ) ) == NULL )
00480       {
00481         res_CREATE4.status = nfs4_Errno( cache_status ) ;
00482         return res_CREATE4.status ;
00483       }      
00484 
00485       /* If entry exists pentry_new is not null but cache_status was set */
00486       if( cache_status == CACHE_INODE_ENTRY_EXISTS )
00487       {
00488         res_CREATE4.status = NFS4ERR_EXIST ;
00489         return res_CREATE4.status ;
00490       }   
00491      break ;
00492           
00493     default:
00494       /* Should never happen, but return NFS4ERR_BADTYPE in this case */
00495       res_CREATE4.status = NFS4ERR_BADTYPE ;
00496       return  res_CREATE4.status ;
00497       break ;
00498     } /* switch( arg_CREATE4.objtype.type ) */
00499   
00500   
00501   /* Now produce the filehandle to this file */
00502   if( ( pnewfsal_handle = cache_inode_get_fsal_handle( pentry_new, &cache_status ) ) == NULL )
00503     {
00504       res_CREATE4.status = nfs4_Errno( cache_status ) ;
00505       return  res_CREATE4.status ;
00506     }
00507  
00508   /* Allocation of a new file handle */
00509   if( nfs4_AllocateFH( &newfh4 ) != NFS4_OK )
00510     {
00511       res_CREATE4.status = NFS4ERR_SERVERFAULT ;
00512       return res_CREATE4.status ;
00513     }
00514 
00515   /* Building the new file handle */
00516   if( !nfs4_FSALToFhandle( &newfh4, pnewfsal_handle, data ) )
00517     {
00518       res_CREATE4.status = NFS4ERR_SERVERFAULT ;
00519       return  res_CREATE4.status ;
00520     }
00521   
00522   /* This new fh replaces the current FH */
00523   data->currentFH.nfs_fh4_len = newfh4.nfs_fh4_len ;
00524   memcpy( data->currentFH.nfs_fh4_val, newfh4.nfs_fh4_val, newfh4.nfs_fh4_len ) ;
00525   
00526   /* No do not need newfh any more */
00527   Mem_Free( (char *)newfh4.nfs_fh4_val ) ;
00528   
00529   /* Set the mode if requested */
00530   /* Use the same fattr mask for reply, if one attribute was not settable, NFS4ERR_ATTRNOTSUPP was replyied */
00531   res_CREATE4.CREATE4res_u.resok4.attrset.bitmap4_len = arg_CREATE4.createattrs.attrmask.bitmap4_len ;
00532   
00533   if( arg_CREATE4.createattrs.attrmask.bitmap4_len != 0 )
00534     {
00535       if( ( cache_status = cache_inode_setattr( pentry_new,
00536                                                 &sattr,
00537                                                 data->ht, 
00538                                                 data->pclient, 
00539                                                 data->pcontext, 
00540                                                 &cache_status ) ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00541         
00542         {
00543           res_CREATE4.status = nfs4_Errno( cache_status ) ;
00544           return res_CREATE4.status ;
00545         }
00546       
00547       /* Allocate a new bitmap */
00548       res_CREATE4.CREATE4res_u.resok4.attrset.bitmap4_val = 
00549         (unsigned int *)Mem_Alloc( res_CREATE4.CREATE4res_u.resok4.attrset.bitmap4_len * sizeof( u_int ) ) ;
00550 
00551       if( res_CREATE4.CREATE4res_u.resok4.attrset.bitmap4_val == NULL )
00552         {
00553           res_CREATE4.status = NFS4ERR_SERVERFAULT ;
00554           return res_CREATE4.status ;
00555         }
00556       memset( res_CREATE4.CREATE4res_u.resok4.attrset.bitmap4_val, 0, res_CREATE4.CREATE4res_u.resok4.attrset.bitmap4_len ) ;
00557 
00558       memcpy( res_CREATE4.CREATE4res_u.resok4.attrset.bitmap4_val, 
00559               arg_CREATE4.createattrs.attrmask.bitmap4_val, 
00560               res_CREATE4.CREATE4res_u.resok4.attrset.bitmap4_len * sizeof( u_int ) ) ;
00561     }
00562   
00563   /* Get the change info on parent directory after the operation was successfull */
00564   if( ( cache_status = cache_inode_getattr( pentry_parent, 
00565                                             &attr_parent, 
00566                                             data->ht, 
00567                                             data->pclient, 
00568                                             data->pcontext, 
00569                                             &cache_status ) ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00570     {
00571       res_CREATE4.status = nfs4_Errno( cache_status ) ;
00572       return res_CREATE4.status ;
00573     } 
00574   memset( &(res_CREATE4.CREATE4res_u.resok4.cinfo.after), 0, sizeof( changeid4 ) );
00575   res_CREATE4.CREATE4res_u.resok4.cinfo.after = (changeid4)pentry_parent->internal_md.mod_time ;
00576   
00577   /* Operation is supposed to be atomic .... */
00578   res_CREATE4.CREATE4res_u.resok4.cinfo.atomic = TRUE ;
00579   
00580 #ifdef _DEBUG_NFS_V4
00581   printf( "           CREATE CINFO before = %llu  after = %llu  atomic = %d\n", 
00582           res_CREATE4.CREATE4res_u.resok4.cinfo.before, 
00583           res_CREATE4.CREATE4res_u.resok4.cinfo.after, 
00584           res_CREATE4.CREATE4res_u.resok4.cinfo.atomic ) ;
00585 #endif
00586 
00587   /* @todo : BUGAZOMEU: fair ele free dans cette fonction */
00588   
00589   /* Keep the vnode entry for the file in the compound data */
00590   data->current_entry = pentry_new ;
00591   data->current_filetype = pentry_new->internal_md.type ;
00592   
00593   /* If you reach this point, then no error occured */
00594   res_CREATE4.status = NFS4_OK ;
00595   
00596   return res_CREATE4.status;
00597 } /* nfs4_op_create */
00598 
00599 
00610 void nfs4_op_create_Free( CREATE4res * resp )
00611 {
00612   if( resp->status == NFS4_OK )
00613     Mem_Free( resp->CREATE4res_u.resok4.attrset.bitmap4_val ) ;
00614 
00615   return ;
00616 } /* nfs4_op_create_Free */
